resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75027</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75027</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aeb-e06c-41bb-2dd0-e2b34c64c3d7#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Tutanhamon fáraó halotti maszkja.</string>
            <string language="en">Tutankhamun's death mask</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Totenmaske Tutankhamuns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Masque de mort de Tutankhamun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Máscara de morte de Tutankhamun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mascherina di morte del Tutankhamun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάσκα θανάτου Tutankhamun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Máscara de muerte de Tutankhamun</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">aranymaszk, lazúrkő-, türkiz- és karneolberakással.</string>
            <string language="en">golden mask, with lazurit, turquoise and carneol inlaid.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Kr.e. 14. század,  Tutanhamon fáraó halotti maszkja,  maszk,  aranylemez,  domborítás,  trébelés,  vésés,  lazúrkő,  türkiz,  karneol,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, 14th century BC, Tutankhamun's death mask,  mask,  golden leaf,  relief,  repoussage,  carving,  lazurit,  turquoise,  carneol,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">goldene Schablone, mit lazurit, Türkis 
und carneol legte ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">masque d'or, avec le lazurit, la turquoise et le 
carneol marquetés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">máscara dourada, com o lazurit, a turquesa e o 
carneol embutidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mascherina dorata, con lazurit, turchese ed il 
carneol intarsiati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρυσή μάσκα, με το lazurit, το τυρκουάζ και το 
carneol που ενθέτονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">máscara de oro, con el lazurit, la turquesa y el
carneol embutidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, 14. Jahrhundert BC, Totenmaske 
Tutankhamuns, Schablone, goldenes Blatt, Entlastung, repoussage, 
schnitzend, lazurit, Türkis, carneol,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, 14ème siècle BC, masque de mort de 
Tutankhamun, masque, feuille d'or, soulagement, repoussage, 
découpant, lazurit, turquoise, carneol,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, 1ô século BC, máscara de morte de 
Tutankhamun, máscara, folha dourada, relevo, repoussage, carving, 
lazurit, turquesa, carneol,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, quattordicesimo secolo BC, mascherina di morte 
del Tutankhamun, mascherina, foglio dorato, rilievo, repoussage, 
intagliante, lazurit, turchese, carneol,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, 14$ος αιώνας Π.Χ., μάσκα θανάτου 
Tutankhamun, μάσκα, χρυσό φύλλο, ανακούφιση, repoussage, 
γλυπτική, lazurit, τυρκουάζ, carneol,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, 14to siglo A.C., máscara de muerte de 
Tutankhamun, máscara, hoja de oro, relevación, repoussage, tallando,
lazurit, turquesa, carneol,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
